channel.title: How to make a monster drain prayer points
channel.description: ok i want my boss to drain prayer points when they attack so its hard idk were to edit to do that or wat to put any help

item.title: How to make a monster drain prayer points
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You should be able to find it in npchandler/combatassistant(well I think you add it in npchandler itself but the actual method is in combatassistant)

it’s something like

int = prayerDrain(*damage/4)

or something like that was just pulled from my a-hole so don’t expect that to be anywhere near right.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a monster drain prayer points
